content: elevate your winter style with the loretta striped beanie a versatile and cozy accessory suitable for children and adults alike this trendy beanie features stylish stripes and a luxurious faux fur pom pom adding a touch of warmth and flair to your cold-weather wardrobe skill level advanced beginner + sizes child 20-21 teen 21-22 adult 22-23 materials -worsted weight yarn in two contrasting colors -size h/5 0mm crochet hook -faux fur pom pom optional -yarn needle you can also find this pattern free on my blog *this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply melanie jane please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings *
